properties.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Morgan
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 4:33AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain expected. Total snow and
sleet accumulations of one to two inches with ice accumulations
up to one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...In Maryland, Allegany County. In West Virginia, Morgan
County.

* WHEN...Through 7 PM EST this evening. A period of snow is
expected through daybreak this morning. A lull in precipitation
is likely through mid morning, before precipitation becomes more
widespread and changes to sleet and freezing rain by late
morning. Precipitation is expected to end by nightfall.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Due to the cold
ground and road temperatures, snow and ice will accumulate on
all untreated surfaces.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
